markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Sodbuster](/Feats.aspx?ID=1224) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Shoony" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=296" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #153: Life's Long Shadows](/Sources.aspx?ID=29) pg. 73</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Dig Quickly](/Feats.aspx?ID=1214)

</column>

---

Years toiling in soil have made you an expert digger. You gain a burrow Speed of 10 feet through loose soil or dirt.
name: Sodbuster
